/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street, bathed in the soft glow of the sun, is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the depth and perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
